message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $200 to start.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $120. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $200 was my initial offer, but I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. I think that's a fair price considering the value you'll get from it.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. How about $140?  I really want this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
